Room.Name: Muddy Path
Room.Description: This section of the path is slowly being drowned by the nearby swamp to the south, which is creeping slowly inland. Several caved-in buildings sprawl here, torn apart both by battle and the elements.

Exit.Description: A broken road leading southward into the marsh.

ExtraDescription.Description: The swamp to the south even reaches as far as this point ... it makes the ground and air about you moist and fetid.

Room.Name: Swamp's Edge
Room.Description: Briars and marsh plants stick to your boots and clothes, and clouds cover the skies above the murky marsh, leaving the path before you dark and sinister. You see some disturbances in the marsh, but after a few strangled screams, the sounds stop.

Exit.Description: To the east lies a series of bogs and shallows that look rather threatening.
You notice a large hill rising out of the marsh to the south.

Room.Name: Marshy Forest
Room.Description: This area is by no means a forest, but for those who dwell in these sparse trees it is one. Occasionally you see a whole humanoid form floating face down in the water, but mostly you only find pieces. You hear a loud bellow in the distance. And feel fear creep into your heart.

Exit.Description: Eastward is the thick bog of ooze...
Westward lies the remanents of a broken and shattered roadway being swallowed by the marsh.

ExtraDescription.Description: He looks mangled and shredded. You see one large gash mark that looks like it came from the claw of some huge beast.
You see severed limbs and spongy intestines.

Room.Name: On a hill.
Room.Description: You stand atop a hill on the northwestern side of the evil swamp. Dark clouds whip around you and the wind raises its voice and assails you.

Exit.Description: To the north lies a damp broken roadway.
A dark pool congeals to the east.
A gloomy path leads down the hill into the swamp.

Room.Name: An Oozing Bog
Room.Description: You stand in an oozing quagmire. A creaking beat fills the air, accompanied by groans and soughing of the air. Several large winged beasts flap over you and send chilling glares your way. You feel out of place, and feel that the occupants of this realm will soon have you for a feast.

Exit.Description: Eastward lies a horde of disgusting looking monsters.
Westward lies a marshy area.

ExtraDescription.Description: You see a large creature, possibly a demon, flapping heavily above you.

Room.Name: An Oozing Bog
Room.Description: The ground here is soft and oozing. You feel slimy water seeping into your boots. Better stop and check for leeches when you get out of here.

Exit.Description: You see a large tree limb that looks easily moved.

ExtraDescription.Description: The limb looks like it is attached to a trap door in the ground.

Room.Name: Swamp Thing's Lair
Room.Description: A horrible swamp thing resides here. Mutilated corpses suffuse the air with the overwhelming stench of putrid flesh.

Exit.Description: A pool of quick sand lies to the west.

ExtraDescription.Description: You notice a note on one of the corpses reading: 'Best ye forget the temple, it is not for the likes of you...'

Room.Name: Pool of Quick Sand
Room.Description: You stand by a large oozing pool of quick sand. Luckily only a complete klutz could not avoid it. Dancing lights fly about you and one seems to be taunting you towards the pool.

Exit.Description: The swamp thing's lair.
A murky bog.
A dark pool lies to the west.

ExtraDescription.Description: From the stories you have heard, you recognize them as will-o-wisps.
It looks deadly to the foolish.

Room.Name: A Dark Pool.
Room.Description: You stand beside a large dark pond. The water boils not with heat, but with motion, as if it is alive. A creaking beat pulses through the air, leaving you with a cold sweat and fear in your heart.

Exit.Description: A large pool of quicksand lies to the east.
You see a cloud of darkness to the south.
A hill rises out of the swamp to the east.

ExtraDescription.Description: It looks ALIVE ...

Room.Name: Gloomy Path Through the Marsh.
Room.Description: To the north lies a hill, shrouded in dark clouds, and to the south lies a huge patch of vegetation. You sense an evil presence and notice a beast flying overhead to the south east, towards what looks to be a huge fortress, half buried in the marsh.

Exit.Description: To the north a hill protrudes from the marshes.
To the south a huge mass of vegetation seems to quiver with life.

ExtraDescription.Description: The clouds look dark and foreboding.
It looks to be a demon of some foul breed.
It is surrounded by walls nearly 20 meters high. In a tall tower on the northeast side, a window glows blue with magical energy.
It looks sentient.

Room.Name: Cloud of Darkness.
Room.Description: As you travel through this cloud of darkness, a fear such as you have never known before assails you.

Exit.Description: A dark pool lies to the north.
An obelisk lies to the south.

Room.Name: Near Vegetation from Hell.
Room.Description: You stand near some of the strangest plant life you have ever seen, a mixture of tumescent vegetables, evil-smelling fruit trees, and malignant ferns.

Exit.Description: To the north is a gloomy path through the marsh.
Eastward is a large, black stone monolith.

ExtraDescription.Description: They look rather violent, and snap at you when you come near.

Room.Name: By the Monolith.
Room.Description: You are standing near a monolith which protrudes some 20 feet from the marsh into the air. Its black obsidian surface shines darkly in the strange, almost unearthly light that enters through the clouds above.

Exit.Description: To the north is a cloud of darkest evil.
Eastward lies a murky bog.
Near Vegetation from Hell.

ExtraDescription.Description: This huge monolith resembles nothing you have ever seen before. You have a strong feeling not to go within.

Room.Name: Murky Bog.
Room.Description: A murky bog surrounds you. To the east a black monolith juts forth from the ground. Far to the north lies a huge pool of quicksand. Snarls can be heard echoing as if from a great distance.

Exit.Description: To the north lies a huge pool of quicksand.
To the east the marsh turns into a small lake.
Westward a large monolith awaits adventurers.

ExtraDescription.Description: This is a huge obsidian stone block stuck in the marsh.

Room.Name: Northern Lake Side.
Room.Description: Floating on this boiling lake is not what you would consider an enjoyable experience. Many a creature bumps the bottom of your boat, and glares at you through unblinking eyes from the waters below. The southern portion of the lake looks calm and serene compared to this wild place.

Exit.Description: The southern portion of the lake lies to the south.
To the west lies a murky bog.

Room.Name: Southern Lake Side.
Room.Description: You are floating on a calm section of blue crystal water. You feel much more at ease then you were before in this area. Then a wave of fear passes over you. You are not alone.

Exit.Description: Northern lake side.
To the west is a beach where your boat can land.

ExtraDescription.Description: The way to the north seems to be impassable, due to the rough water and strange wild life.

Room.Name: Beach
Room.Description: You are on a sandy shore. Marsh life creeps across the surface. To the west lies an evil fortress. You see figures walking along the battlements.

Exit.Description: To the east lies the southern portion of a small lake.
The great gates.

ExtraDescription.Description: It is hewn of black stone and heavily fortified.

Room.Name: Before the Great Gates.
Room.Description: You stand before the gates of a huge fortress. The drawbridge is up, the gates closed, and the portcullis down. This place looks very dangerous, and you decide not to continue onward.

Exit.Description: To the east is a marshy beach.

NPC.name: oldstyle troll
NPC.description: This huge behemoth towers to a height of 15 feet. He sneers at you as he approaches and raises two black taloned claws to strike you.
NPC.longDescription: A swamp troll charges towards you.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive StayArea AssistRace

NPC.name: oldstyle troll
NPC.description: This big troll towers several feet over you. He has a large spear which he seems to ply with utmost prowess. He jabs his spear at you and cackles with glee.
NPC.longDescription: A green troll attempts to get a hold on you.

NPC.name: oldstyle ogre
NPC.description: This mean bastard looks like he could tear you limb from limb.
NPC.longDescription: An ogre stands here getting ready to beat in your face.

NPC.name: oldstyle thing
NPC.description: The Swamp Thing has huge fists, which look like they could pound you flat.
NPC.longDescription: The Swamp Thing shambles about here. It seems hungry.

NPC.name: oldstyle gnoll
NPC.description: The Gnoll seems annoyed at your presence.
NPC.longDescription: There is a mean looking gnoll here.

NPC.name: oldstyle beast
NPC.description: This huge beast stands about 20 feet in height and has huge green clawed appendages.
NPC.longDescription: A huge hairy beast shambles towards you with death in his eyes.

NPC.name: oldstyle beast
NPC.description: This rather small beast looks like you could take it out with a single sword blow.
NPC.longDescription: A rather small beast cringes in terror as it notices you.

NPC.name: oldstyle will will-o-wisp
NPC.description: This strange little creature seems very hard to keep your eyes on. You stare as hard as you can at the glowing ball of floating light and are just able to notice a small pair of glowing eyes.
NPC.longDescription: A Will-O-Wisp darts hear and there, making fun of you.

NPC.name: oldstyle snake anaconda
NPC.description: This 10 meter anaconda looks rather hungry.
NPC.longDescription: A monstrous snake slithers towards you, thinking 'breakfast'.
NPC.flags: NPC Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Wimpy AssistRace

NPC.name: oldstyle snake python
NPC.description: It's the largest Amazon python you have ever seen.
NPC.longDescription: A rather large python rests in a coil here.
NPC.flags: NPC Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Wimpy AssistRace

NPC.name: oldstyle hag
NPC.description: Yech! She manages to make even Smurfette look attractive. That's ok, because she thinks you stink too, and she's about to do something about it.

NPC.name: oldstyle slaad
NPC.description: This dark apparition stands a meager 13 feet in height. Even in the dim swamp light, the blade of his scythe gleams.
NPC.longDescription: A Death Slaad is standing here distraught. He seems lost.

NPC.name: oldstyle wolf
NPC.description: This wolf looks plump. She probably ate a friend or two of yours who came into the marsh.
NPC.longDescription: A marsh wolf sniffs the ground has followed your scent.

NPC.name: oldstyle mound shambling
NPC.description: This grotesque pile of plant matter fills you with utmost horror.
NPC.longDescription: A heap of garbage shambles towards you.

NPC.name: oldstyle shaman orc
NPC.description: This old orc has an array of bones stuck in his hair and strange symbols painted on his face and hands.
NPC.longDescription: An orc shaman stands before you holding a staff and wearing robes.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Cleric AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle giant
NPC.description: This huge monster of a man has green gnarly teeth and a BIG stick.
NPC.longDescription: A marsh giant stomps towards you.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive StayArea AssistRace

NPC.name: oldstyle gargoyle
NPC.description: This creepy fellow looks like he could use you as a meal.
NPC.longDescription: A large gargoyle lands next to you, baring his fangs at you.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive StayArea AssistVnum

Item.Name: horned helmet
Item.LongDescription: A wicked looking horned helmet lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: These horns appear to be made of adamantite.

Item.Name: chain mail chainmail
Item.LongDescription: An old suit of chainmail lies here, corroded by the marsh.

Item.Name: scythe
Item.LongDescription: An evil, wicked-looking scythe lies in the shadows.

Item.Name: green potion
Item.LongDescription: A murky green potion lies here in the mud.

ExtraDescription.Description: It looks really disgusting and doesn't smell very nice either.

Item.Name: claymore rusty sword
Item.LongDescription: A huge rusted sword lies in a pool of water.
